title: gzclient segfault on startup using AMD graphics with Radeon Driver Ubuntu 16.04

content.raw:
Randomly occuring startup crash in gzclient. Occurs sporactically (~70% of the time) on all kinds of simulations, and empty world.

Backtrace:
```
Thread 1 "gzclient" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007fffccf6e04e in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri/radeonsi_dri.so
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007fffccf6e04e in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri/radeonsi_dri.so
#1  0x00007fffccf6cc4d in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri/radeonsi_dri.so
#2  0x00007fffccf75331 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/dri/radeonsi_dri.so
#3  0x00007fffc3c4cea0 in Ogre::GLRenderSystem::clearFrameBuffer(unsigned int, Ogre::ColourValue const&, float, unsigned short) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.9.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#4  0x00007ffff4baf30d in Ogre::SceneManager::_renderScene(Ogre::Camera*, Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#5  0x00007ffff4bebf51 in Ogre::Camera::_renderScene(Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#6  0x00007ffff4b9077a in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateViewport(Ogre::Viewport*, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#7  0x00007ffff4b905cb in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateAutoUpdatedViewports(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#8  0x00007ffff4b9011e in Ogre::RenderTarget::updateImpl() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#9  0x00007ffff4b90ac4 in Ogre::RenderTarget::update(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.9.0
#10 0x00007ffff5f2c0dc in gazebo::rendering::Camera::Render(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#11 0x00007ffff76aee1a in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_gui.so.7
#12 0x00007ffff76a5890 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::paintEvent(QPaintEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_gui.so.7
#13 0x00007ffff53a98d0 in QWidget::event(QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#14 0x00007ffff5352fdc in QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper(QObject*, QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#15 0x00007ffff5359f16 in QApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#16 0x00007ffff720590d in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#17 0x00007ffff53a3f37 in QWidgetPrivate::drawWidget(QPaintDevice*, QRegion const&, QPoint const&, int, QPainter*, QWidgetBackingStore*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#18 0x00007ffff55768ad in QWidgetPrivate::repaint_sys(QRegion const&) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#19 0x00007ffff5396be7 in QWidgetPrivate::syncBackingStore() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#20 0x00007ffff53a99b8 in QWidget::event(QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#21 0x00007ffff5352fdc in QApplicationPrivate::notify_helper(QObject*, QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#22 0x00007ffff5359f16 in QApplication::notify(QObject*, QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#23 0x00007ffff720590d in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#24 0x00007ffff72093c6 in QCoreApplicationPrivate::sendPostedEvents(QObject*, int, QThreadData*) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#25 0x00007ffff723613e in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4

#33 0x00007ffff720a4b9 in QCoreApplication::exec() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#34 0x00007ffff76b7873 in gazebo::gui::run(int, char**) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_gui.so.7
#35 0x00000000004013aa in ?? ()
#36 0x00007ffff6535830 in __libc_start_main (main=0x401390, argc=2, argv=0x7fffffffd9a8, init=<optimized out>, fini=<optimized out>, rtld_fini=<optimized out>, 
    stack_end=0x7fffffffd998) at ../csu/libc-start.c:291
#37 0x0000000000401459 in _start ()
```
